text: Wide Open is the second studio album by Canadian band Weaves. It was released on October 6, 2017 through Kanine Records. The album was a shortlisted finalist for the 2018 Polaris Music Prize."Polaris Music Prize Reveals 2018 Short List". Exclaim!, July 17, 2018. ==Accolades== {|class="sortable wikitable" |- ! Publication ! Accolade !
